rules_text:
Covert [i](This creature can't be blocked by creatures that weren't under their controllers control since the start of their last turn.)[/i]
When this creature enters, you may pay {1}. If you do, seize The Core. [i](Get {E} or surveil 1. A player with the core seizes it at their upkeep. Unblocked creatures seize the core.)[/i]
